article_title: US says it aims to 'lower temperature' in Middle East
sentence: Stop  imagining  that  you  can  reason  with  the  Israeli  government  so  it  stops  killing  civilians  by  the  thousands,  imposing  famine,  torturing  prisoners,  colonising  and  annexing  our  land,  all  while  you  appeal  to  them,  call  on  them,  demand  them  to  stop,"  Mr  Mansour  said.
